attributes.action: Allow anyone affected by the loss of data by the government to reclaim the cost of signing up to credit reference agencies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the Government has lost our personal details, putting twenty-five million of us at a great risk of identity theft, allow us to reclaim, in full against tax, the cost of signing up to credit reference agencies in order to monitor activities in our name.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
